summary.para: Describes which levels of hardware composition are supported.

remarks.para: Values of this enumeration are returned from the method in the pFlags out parameter.

summary.para: This flag specifies that swapchain composition can be facilitated in a performant manner using hardware for fullscreen applications.
This flag specifies that swapchain composition can be facilitated in a performant manner using hardware for windowed applications.
This flag specifies that swapchain composition facilitated using hardware can cause the cursor to appear stretched.
